report.title: Pleasurable and Smooth
report.author: Prism
report.bodytext: Dosage of 10mg each, following a few hours after coming down from 2C-C trip. Will report as needed. /n /n T +0:00 /n 10 mg ingested with coke (the soft drink, if there was doubt). Stronger bitter/chem taste than 60mg's of 2C-C taken earlier. /n /n T+0:15 /n No discernable effects. Considering another 10mgs. /n /n T'+0:25 /n Feeling a little light-headed. Taking another 10mgs. Fluke is going strong. /n /n T senses things starting to happen. mild tingling, chills. /n /n T+0:35 /n /n E: Sudden euphoric rush toes-to-head. things definitely happening, though no sensory distortion. O feeling light discomfort. /n /n T+0:55. /n /n O claims neural damage. None of us have any visuals. Good mood, though, except O. Mild-medium euphoric tingling, nothing overwhelming. Testing hash as a possible booster. Issues being debated eagerly: Base jumping and pez. /n /n T+4:00 /n /n T and E still feeling the good mood and some other trippy sensations, while O just feels tired. E and O heads home. /n /n Conclusion: T and E found this chemical to be very pleasant and enjoyable, nothing heavy. Whilst O found it unpleasant, had other effects and came down hours before the others. /n /n Two found it very pleasant, whilst the third had only bad feelings, and had no plans of doing it over. /n /n Now its T+4:15 and I am alone(T) and still feeling very pleasant. Thinking about snorting 100mg Dpt, but I think I`ll smoke another bong while I think about it some more. /n /n 3 bong hits later: I`m not in doubt that THC really enhances the good vibes and floaty sensation, having problems writhing this, so I`ll take a break. The room is spinning. /n /n T+7:00 /n /n The ganja is wearing off, and I decide to snort 50 mg of dpt. I am really exhausted because Ive been awake for over two days on amphetamines. /n /n While the DPT is kicking inn I make two big bong hits, and smoke one. I just float in to a trancelike state, listening to chill out music, and I think I was asleep by 8,00. /n /n Slept the whole day, until 3 in the afternoon feeling hungry and exhausted. I went out and got some food, and now I feel fine (dropped 20mg valium 20 min. ago). /n /n This could change the effects a bit, but T (two days on speed) and E quiet rested, had very similar experiences.
